name: Smaug
text:
Break: Target resonator gains [+400/+0] until end of turn.
Enter: You may put up to three [Addition:Resonator] cards from your hand and/or your graveyard on this card.
Activate. Pay R1: Banish an [Addition:Resonator] on this card. If you do, this card deals 300 damage to target resonator or player.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
